text: Michael B. Diven (March 27, 1970 â€“ August 18, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives for the 22nd District between 2001 to 2006. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Diven died on August 18, 2020 in Pittsburgh, aged 50. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael Diven
